def names(instances):
  return {instance.name for instance in instances}

result = {}
# neighbors in both direction
results["result"] = {
  "direction=both, device": names(device.get_neighbors("device")),
	"direction=both, link": names(device.get_neighbors("link")),
	"direction=source, device": names(device.get_neighbors("device", direction="source")),
	"direction=source, link": names(device.get_neighbors("link", direction="source")),
	"direction=destination, device": names(device.get_neighbors("device", direction="destination")),
  "direction=destination, link" : names(device.get_neighbors("link", direction="destination")),
	"direction=both, device, 10G": names(device.get_neighbors("device", model="10G")),
  "direction=both, link, 400G": names(device.get_neighbors("link", model="400G")),
  "direction=source, device, 40G": names(device.get_neighbors("device", direction="source", model="40G")),
  "direction=destination, link, 10G": names(device.get_neighbors("link", direction="destination", model="10G")),
}
results["expected_result"] = {
  "direction=both, device": {"Austin", "Atlanta", "Houston", "LosAngeles"},
	"direction=both, link": {"link13", "link25", "link0", "link24", "link25-3", "link25-2"},
	"direction=source, device": {"Atlanta", "LosAngeles"},
	"direction=source, link": {"link25", "link24", "link25-3", "link25-2"},
	"direction=destination, device": {"Austin", "Houston"},
  "direction=destination, link": {"link13", "link0"},
	"direction=both, device, 10G": {"Houston"},
  "direction=both, link, 400G": {"link25", "link24", "link25-3", "link25-2"},
  "direction=source, device, 40G": set(),
  "direction=destination, link, 10G": {"link0"},
}

results["success"] = True
for test, result in results["result"].items():
    if result != results["expected_result"][test]:
        results["success"] = False
